---
category: news
title: "AI models can ‘sound’ human, but that doesn’t mean they feel or think"
excerpt: "Because of a persistent tendency to associate fluent expression with fluent thought, it is natural – but potentially misleading – to think that if an AI model can express itself fluently, that means it thinks and feels just like humans do."
